video_description: Tablet-News.com reviews the ASUS Eee Pad Slider tablet, a Honeycomb device with a sliding QWERTY tablet. One of the first reviews in the world right here! It's the first in English actually!
title: ASUS Eee Pad Slider Review - Tablet-News.com

comments.text: On Amazon, it is on order for like 800 bucks... I don't know why--either because that is the real price, or because these are the European releases, thus inflation. If it really is $500 then I would definitely consider buying this tablet. Really, it's the first tablet I would even consider buying. All future tablets take note--this is will be the desired form-factor for people who want to do things other than watch YouTube﻿ and play Angry Birds.
